meanings.definition: Not combined with anything else; simple or pure.
meanings.sent1: The uncompounded truth is always the easiest to understand.
meanings.sent2: Her uncompounded joy at seeing her friend was evident in her smile.
meanings.sent3: The uncompounded happiness on the puppy's face was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The uncompounded beauty of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The uncompounded flavor of the fresh fruit was delightful.

meanings.definition: Not mixed or blended with anything else; pure.
meanings.sent1: The uncompounded gold shone brightly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The uncompounded water from the mountain stream tasted so clean.
meanings.sent3: The uncompounded joy of winning the game was overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: Her uncompounded kindness touched everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The uncompounded melody of the song brought tears to my eyes.
